1150700.name: Dark Arena
1150700.description:
You are the leader of the special operations, and it is up to you to find your way out of a very sticky situation - a genetics lab overrun by monsters of every shape and size. Using your advance suit and weapons, you must shoot your way through the lab, destroying the evil creations and saving the lab, and the rest of the world, from total destruction.

It's humans versus genetically engineered monsters in Dark Arena, a futuristic first-person shooter that combines run-and-gun gameplay with strategic play and puzzle solving.

The action roars through 20 levels. Players can access nine different weapons. Dark Arena also sports special multiplayer arenas for as many as four pals.

The Game features Save States, to save progress wherever you want.
1150700.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
